Apples, where are you going!?"/move Apples 0 6 1/emote Abigail 60/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 2 0 1/move Abigail 0 0 3/playMusic spring_day_ambient/emote farmer 16 true/pause 250/emote Abigail 16 true/pause 200/speak Abigail "@!!!?$7"/pause 200/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event1#You can see Junimos too?#$r -1 0 abigail_event2#That was a Junimo you were playing with!"/pause 500/move Abigail -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "I don't know what to say, @. My heart is pounding right now.$2"/pause 1000/move Abigail 0 0 2/pause 1500/emote Abigail 40/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Apples "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event3#How about we take turns asking questions? You can go first.#$r -1 0 abigail_event4#There are so many questions I have. I'm sure you do too."/pause 300/move Abigail 0 0 3/emote Abigail 40/pause 500/emote Abigail 8/pause 500/speak Abigail "You called Apples a Junimo?"/pause 500/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event5#That's what the forest spirits in the valley are called. Rasmodius told me.#$r -1 0 abigail_event6#They're called Junimos. I read about them in a book."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 300/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event7#Is Apples your friend?#$r -1 0 abigail_event8#When did you first see a Junimo?"/pause 500/emote Abigail 8/pause 250/speak Abigail "When did you see a Junimo for the first time?$0"/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event9#I saw Junimos at the community center. I thought they were rats.#$r -1 0 abigail_event10#I think I saw my first Junimo when I was a kid."/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 250/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event11#Can you understand their language?#$r -1 0 abigail_event12#Have you told anyone about Junimos?"/pause 400/emote Abigail 40/emote Abigail 16/emote Abigail 48/emote Abigail 8/pause 250/speak Abigail "Are you able to understand Junimo, @?"/pause 500/speak Abigail "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 abigail_event13#I can read it, but I can't speak it. Rasmodius gave me an elixir.#$r -1 0 abigail_event14#Yes, I can. The Wizard made a magical potion."/pause 500/move Abigail 0 0 0/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/pause 450/speak Abigail "I sometimes walk near his tower, just because I'm curious.$8#$b#I've even knocked on his door and tried opening it a few times. But it's always locked.$9"/pause 1000/speak Abigail "...$2"/pause 1500/speak Abigail "...I don't know. I feel like my mom is hiding something from me.$2"/pause 500/emote Abigail 28/pause 500/move Abigail 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "@, let's keep this a secret. Okay?$2"/pause 500/question fork0 "#Your secret is safe with me.#No. We should tell people."/fork 1000007_KeepSecret/pause 1000/emote Abigail 12/pause 250/speak Abigail "I said I FEEL like she may be hiding something. I don't have any proof.$5#$b#I'd rather keep this a secret, @...$2"/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/pause 300/speak Abigail "I've been out here for a while. I'll see you later.$9#$b#Please... don't say anything, to my mom or anyone else.$2"/pause 300/move Abigail 0 1 2/move farmer 0 0 2/move Abigail -3 0 3/move Abigail 0 1 0/emote farmer 60/emote Abigail 28/pause 300/speak Abigail "I'm serious, @. I won't forgive you if you tell my mom.$5"/emote farmer 36/pause 400/move Abigail -3 0 3/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Abigail -250/end position 63 51/end dialogue Abigail "@, it's important we keep this a secret to protect the Junimos.$2#$b#Who knows what would happen if Joja found out? Please...$2"
Entries.1000007_KeepSecret: friendship Abigail 50/pause 400/speak Abigail "Thanks, @.$0"/pause 1000/speak Abigail "In a way, we're both special, aren't we?$0#$b#We both have amazing unique gifts. I wonder why they picked us.$1"/pause 500/warp Apples 72 52/playSound junimoMeep1/move Abigail 0 0 1/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/playMusic woodsTheme/move Apples -3 0 2/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 100/jump Apples/textAboveHead Abigail "Apples! You came back!"/pause 200/move Apples 0 -1 2/playSound junimoMeep1/move Apples -4 0 3/pause 200/playSound junimoMeep1/jump Apples/pause 400/speak Apples "!!!"/pause 100/emote Abigail 20 true/pause 250/emote farmer 20 true/pause 150/move Apples 0 1 2/move Abigail 0 0 2/move Apples -2 0 2/move farmer 0 0 2/playSound junimoMeep1/emote farmer 32/jump Apples/pause 500/jump Apples/playSound junimoMeep1/move Abigail 0 0 3/move farmer 0 0 3/move Apples -4 0 0/warp Apples -1000 -1000/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 300/speak Abigail "I think that was Apples' way of saying hello to you!$4#$b#Like I said, she's very vocal!$0"/pause 1000/move Abigail 0 0 0/pause 1500/move Abigail 0 0 3/pause 700/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/question fork1 "Want to walk out of the forest with me?#Of course.#I'm going to stay here. You go on ahead."/fork 1000007_LeaveForest/pause 500/speak Abigail "Oh, okay. I'll catch you later then.$0"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 1 3/move Abigail -2 0 3/move farmer 0 0 3/move Abigail -1 0 3/pause 500/move Abigail 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Abigail "This has been a magical day, @. I'll talk to you soon!$0"/pause 400/emote Abigail 32/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail AbigailJunimo/pause 700/end dialogue Abigail "I still can't believe we can both see Junimos, @. It's our little secret!$1"
Entries.1000007_LeaveForest: pause 500/speak Abigail "Great! let's go!$0"/pause 300/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Forest/playMusic spring_day_ambient/warp Apples 5 5/warp farmer 6 108/warp Abigail 7 108/positionOffset farmer 0 15/pause 1000/viewport 14 108 true/move farmer 0 0 1/move Abigail 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Abigail "Phew, I sometimes get lost in there still, even though I spend so much time exploring.$9."/pause 1000/speak Abigail "Well, I'm going to head back home.$6#$b#Running into you and discovering we can both see forest spirits was...$0"/pause 1000/move Abigail 0 0 2/pause 500/emote Abigail 20/pause 500/move Abigail 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "It was magical, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote Abigail 32/pause 500/move Abigail 5 0 1/pause 700/move Abigail 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "I'll see you later!$1"/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail AbigailJunimo/pause 600/end dialogue Abigail "I still can't believe we can both see Junimos, @. It's our little secret!"
